Description.Text:
Position The hotel is centrally located, about 250m from the sea. ARMA DI TAGGIA is a delightful, italian seaside town and one of largest and most important on the Riviera dei Fiori, Arma is the touristical zone. Taggia is the most large historical centre of the province, but the second after Genova still maintains its ancient ligurian traditions where the sanctuary of the Madonna Miracolosa, chiostri can be visited.
Restaurant The kitchen offers a buffet with salads, regional and international recipes, fresh pasta and home made pastries.

More Informations The hotel has a large polifunctional room with radio microphone, where one can follow tv activities, play cards, bingo ecc. Solarium upon the roof, a well-tended garden with flowers and plants the whole season, bar, reception, reading room and parking space.
